name: Biscuit Squad
description:
BiscuitSquad is an online multiplayer 2D platformer battle royal game set in the world of Biscatis in the NariniVerse. Pick a character join a random room and shoot your way to victory or play with up to 8 friends in a custom room. An action packed adventure to just chill and play around.

Now an official NariniMugen E-Sports League tournament game
